description:
Have you ever wondered what it takes to create those professional eye catching cinematic logo video intros and outros for advertisements, campaigns and youtube channels? Looking to create such works for both yourself and others?

and..

Have you always wanted to jump into the freelancing industry (making money online) but don't know where to start?
Now is your chance with this Jump Into Freelancing with Adobe After Effects Course!

This course teaches you the fastest method to get right started with minimal time and skill. I will show you exactly step by step how I was able to generate over $1,500 a month!

Even if you have never touched Adobe After Effects, you will learn all there is to know from the start to the end in this course. I will guide you every step of the way, and I'm always here if you have any questions or want more lessons. Thank you for checking out this course!
title: Jump into Freelancing with Adobe After Effects
